Address.label: Address
Address.value: 83 CLEMENCEAU AVENUE NO. 12-03 UE SQUARE, SINGAPORE, 239920, Singapore

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: ASLAN Pharmaceuticals Ltd is a clinical-stage immunology focused biopharmaceutical company developing innovative treatments to transform the lives of patients. The company is evaluating ASLAN004, a potential first-in-class antibody targeting the IL-13 receptor, in atopic dermatitis, and ASLAN003, a potent oral inhibitor of DHODH, which is being developed for autoimmune disease.
